label: Research Internship
description: Supervised on-campus learning experience with faculty engaged in research. Approved for letter and S/U grading. May be repeated in the same or separate terms to a maximum of 10 hours. Prerequisite: Consent of instructor; not open to students on probation.
courseSectionInformation: Approved for letter and S/U grading. May be repeated in the same or separate terms to a maximum of 10 hours. Prerequisite: Consent of instructor; not open to students on probation.
